title: How to redirect a domain and port to another domain andport - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi, First of all I’m not an expert but here is a list of solutions that i have used in the past. 1- Change the DNS record 2-You may consider to modify network configuration to add new NAT rules . 3-If you have a load balancer you can tweak it to forward the traffic to another domain. 4-Use iptables

You can do this from the domain control panel. There will be an option for domain forwarding. You can submit the another domain that you want to redirect. Thats all. If you still need any more help. Comment here. I will be happy to assist you.
